text: The name Lucy [ loo-see ] is a French and English female given name. It is feminine for the male name Lucius (which means "as of light"). There are several celebrities with this name. Fictional characters having the name include Lucy McClane from Die Hard. Lucy is a beautiful, happy, cheerful name. This name was ranked #47 on the US Popular Names in 2021. == People == * Lucy Lawless, New Zealand actress and singer * Lucy Pinder, English glamour model * Lucy Webb Hayes, First Lady of the United States ==References== Category:Given names
title: Lucy
